languageCode.description: Language code that had been used for all language-dependent attributes, like name, url, and comment.

name.description: Name based on defined parcel service and language.

url.description: URL including trackng code based on defined parcel service and language.

comment.example: You can access the shipment tracking for your order by visiting the link above.
comment.description: Comment based on defined parcel service and language.

shipmentType.description: The is a free form input field to define the type of the shipment.
